User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:38.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/38.0
Build ID: 20151221154602

Steps to reproduce:

Create a RSS Feed Livemark in your Bookmark Toolbar
Right Click the Livemark and Choose Properties
Open Bookmarks Library
Select the Livemark


Actual results:

Only the Name & Description fields are shown, with no way to identify the source of the RSS feed nor the source Website.

Issue exists in Fx40 Release through latest Fx46 nightly

I personally have some livemarks without any Name or Description fields filled for the purpose of saving space, and this evening I noticed one of them was failing to load but I couldn't remember which feed it was. I checked the properties, and the Feed or Site location fields were completely missing in Fx40-Fx46. I had to rollback my install to the Fx38.5 ESR to figure out which site those livemarks with no other identification belonged to.


Expected results:

Feed Location & Site Location fields are shown in addition to Name & Description.
comments.creator: cyber.spamage@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
in the rare case you need the rss feed address you can just copy the rss feed bookmark and past to a textfield or a txt file or any other text input.

I don't think we will reintroduce those fields.

(In reply to Marco Bonardo [::mak] from comment #2)
> in the rare case you need the rss feed address you can just copy the rss
> feed bookmark and past to a textfield or a txt file or any other text input.
> 
> I don't think we will reintroduce those fields.

Copying does seem to work for Feed Location, but not for Site Location.

There is also some inconsistency here with tooltips. So if you do not desire to reintroduce those fields, I would ask that you instead fix the following issues. The part where you cannot copy the Site Location in the Tooltip from the Open Link, I would deem most important.

Current Behavior:

Livemark Folder
*No tooltip on hover
*Copy/Paste = Feed Location

Livemark Open Link
*Tooltip for Site Location on hover
*Copy/Paste = Feed Location

Click Livemark Open Link
*Attempts to load Site Location, but the url is not shown in Url Bar is the website is down or not responding.
(this is a general problem with bookmarks/links/redirects in general I believe, where the url being loaded is not visible in the URL bar until the website responds and actually begins to load, which can make it difficult figuring out which url is failing to load.)


Expected Behavior:

Livemark Folder
*Tooltip for RSS Location (?) on hover similar to regular bookmarks
*Copy/Paste = Feed Location

Livemark Open Link
*Tooltip for Site Location on hover
*Copy/Paste = Site Location

Click Livemark Open Link
*Site Location shown in Url Bar even if the website is down and cannot be loaded.


I still would prefer that the Site Location & Feed Location fields be made visible again, but if you add a way to easily copy the Site Location like is currently possible with the Feed Location, I can live with this.
